title: Dirty house
content:
I posted about a month ago looking for the font dirty house, but now I can't find the old thread and with the website where it was... if anyone knows, that would be fantastic. thanks   
chris
author: 2030

comments.content: Specifically, it's part of the [Bad Neighborhood](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116184844/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=HOOD-FO&sub=view) collection.
